column3: Does the media contribute to cavalier attitudes towards food allergies?
column4: I've seen several movies and recently even a television commercial in which a character's food allergy was used as a comedic device. As a person who is allergic to shellfish, this has always bothered me. There is nothing funny about food allergies, and I've only seen it treated as serious in the media in a handful of movies.   I also recently saw this article, which I find rather distressing: http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/39389689/ns/health-allergies_and_asthma/  My question is, do you think that the common depictions of food allergies as funny in the media is contributing to this? And what do you think is a good way to spread awareness of the seriousness of allergies?

column3: Should I see a gynecologist for precancerous cells?
column4: I've had precancerous cells on my cervix from HPV for about a year or year and a half. She never really tells me what's going on with my cervix, just tells me to come back and do it again in six months, although I'm guessing I have low grade lesions and she just wants to monitor them? I'm going to ask her next time and I'm also thinking of asking her if I can see a gynecologist for this. I'm paranoid that I'm going to get cervical cancer and will have to have a hysterectomy.. I'm reading that it can cause nerve damage and ruin your sex life, although it doesn't seem very common, I'm still scared.  Should I ask her if I can a gynecologist? Also has anyone ever had a hysterectomy? If so how did it effect your sex life?

column3: what's wrong with me?
column4: i hate looking in the mirror. i hate being complimented because i know they're lying. i hate choosing what to wear in the morning because it all looks bad on me. i hate spending time with people i care about unless i look 100% perfect or as perfect as someone like me can look, but i hate being alone so i'm always with a friend. i can't stand being criticized at all because i see that as them taking it easy on me when what they're really thinking is much worse. i want more than anything to not feel like this. i can't be myself around people unless i've known them for a long time or i'm with someone i've known for a long time. with my close friends, i'm crazy, and don't worry. i can't open up to people and when i try to, my mind starts racing and goes blank. i can't explain how i feel to anyone out loud. i can't look people in the eyes for very long without feeling uncomfortable. in a relationship, i'm scared of being judged and don't ever make the first move and keep my emotions to myself. i feel even worse because i don't have much of a reason to feel this way. i wasn't bullied. my childhood has been pretty trauma free in my opinion, compared to others. my parents got divorced when i was 7 and i moved with my mom. we moved in with her boyfriend in his crappy little house and i had to wear the same thing to school for a week and got made fun of, but then my dad flew there and brought me back to live with him. a few months later, her ex (who was kind of like a temporary father to me even though he was a total loser) killed himself and my mom found him and has to be hospitalized because it put her into a bad depression (she's bipolar). i found out recently that she had tried to kill herself a little bit before all of that, and has tried to 3 other times. i visit her monthly though and she's not in the hospital anymore. i don't know what else to put into this. i just want to feel better. i just want to be able to look in the mirror and feel pretty. i get told i'm pretty alot, but i can't believe it. i try so hard to. i'm 14 years old, if that makes any difference. i feel like i can't do anything right without disapointing someone. i put alot of thought into this and would really appreciate some actually helpful answers.thanks.

column3: I think I am allergic to my insulin?
column4: I have what I believe to be an insulin allergy. So far, I have tried: Reverting from my insulin pump to MDI  Changing pen tips  Changing insulin pump sites (both in location on the body, varying cannula types, and insertion methods) Using benedryl cream Taking pill-form benedryl  Taking pill-form Zyrtec Using different insulins (Humalog, Novolog, and Apidra) Cleaning the site areas pre-site and post-site with antibiotic ointment and aloe Using different adhesives (including hypoallergenic ones) I'm also experiencing unexplained weight gain, dry hair, nails that won't grow, extreme exhaustion, and headaches, as well as some breathlessness. I had blood drawn, and all of my hormones (including thyroid) came back normal. My A1c is sitting at 7.4% because I cannot get my body to work with insulin.   I am at a loss. I hope that there may be something that can relieve my pain.  Wherever I infuse insulin, the area welts up. It gets red and inflamed. It starts to hurt to put event the slightest pressure on the site or the area around it. It gets hot to the touch. When I pull the site, insulin leaks out from under the skin for a few minutes. Almost a year ago, I was admitted to the hospital after a site got infected, and I was forced to take IV antibiotics to clear up the infection.   I've been to a total of 6 doctors, including three endocrinologists who said that they have never seen anything like it.   Please help?

column3: åÀVivo entre psicopatas?
column4: Vivo en un complejo de apartamentos y la mayoria de vecinos no me quieren. Solo se las pasan espiando y cada que salgo la familia que vive en frente de mi habre la puerta y me da una actidud muy mala, como de burla. Desde que llegue pasa esto, hubo un desacuerdo conmigo y todos estan entre ellos pero se que desde que mi familia y yo llegamos nunca caimos bien. column3: Does Ibuprofen help with stomach aches?
Good workout routine?
column4: I'm a 15 year old 118 lbs teenager with an interest in gaining more muscle and becoming more fit. So far I do:  15 resistant band bicep curls ‰ÛÒ 4 reps 15 resistant band tricep extensions ‰ÛÒ 4 reps 10 pushups rest 5 sec, 10 pushups rest 5 sec, 10 pushups 30 seconds forearms 30 seconds pushup hold 10 pushups rest 5 sec, 10 pushups rest 5 sec, 10 pushups 30 seconds forearms 30 seconds pushup hold 60 second squat against wall, rest 15 sec, 60 seconds squat against wall, 30 seconds squat against wall 50 situps, rest 30 sec, 50 situps 25 tricep bench dips, rest 10 sec 25 tricep bench dips  This is daily, and I know I haven't added cardio but sadly I don't have the time to go to a gym/don't have a treadmill at home.  I also have dumbells to work with at home so I was wondering if anyone had any pieces of advice. Thanks in advance.

column3: cosa ne dite? leggendo questo pezzetto cosa capite?
column4: ricordo la prima tazzina di caffÌ¬ ke ho bevuto...la prima volta ke ho ballato con un ragazzo...il primo giorno di scuola alle elementari...la prima volta ke ho guardato negli occhi il ragazzo ke amo...e anke se poi tutte queste cose si ripetono per molte volte le emozioni ke provi nn sono mai uguali alla prima volta..xkÌ¬ la prima volta c'Ì¬ curiositÌÊ,agitazione,a volte imbarazzo...   05/08/2007 le sue braccia, le sue labbra,le sue mani ke scivolavano sul mio corpo facendomi sentire bene, tranquilla...tra le sue braccia niente e nessuno avrebbero potuto farmi del male...sarei rimasta lÌÂ con lui x ore ed ore..un vento fresco ke ci accarezzava la pelle..quel soffio di vento arrivato all'improvviso e subito il suo abbraccio..forte...come per proteggermi..spostava con le mani i capelli ke mi cadevano sul viso...uno sguardo.. durato poki secondi ke mi sono sembrati una vita..uno sguardo stupendo intenso...uno sguardo innamorato...poke parole d'amore sussurrate dolcemente..stavamo stretti..sempre piÌ_ stretti..il suo petto caldo le sue spalle forti..nonostante quel vento fresco sentivo dentro di me un tepore..una sensazione di pace..stavo bene..bene come nn ero mai stata prima..sentivo il suo cuore battere, nel silenzio di quella meravigliosa notte stellata..e di sicuro.. anke lui sentiva il mio...
